item.title: Chick Blade [ 100% Prim's ]
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆, post:14, topic:380049”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=475891.msg3481041#msg3481041 date=1296126798]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=475891.msg3481029#msg3481029 date=1296122068]

Pink shouldn’t automatically be associated with women.
Now if you put a sandwich, or maybe a dildo as the hilt…

What else looks female on his blade… and im pretty sure females aren’t the only ones to sandwiches and dildos. Now a tampon that’s understandable.
[/quote]Yeah because every guy wants a dildo in there vagina…A mop would be a female sword or a rolling pen. I am sure silabsoft knows.

Yer, girls can have a mop and guys can have a remote… I like that idea, someone should work on that.
[/quote]A remote Maybe next project out of prim’s[/quote]
Really a remote?!?! Awesome.

Read full topic
